subject: Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: When 3,000 reserved-seat tickets to the Belmont Stakes were made available online Monday after I’ll Have Another won the Preakness Stakes, they were snatched up in about three minutes.
snippet: When 3,000 reserved-seat tickets to the Belmont Stakes were made available online Monday after I’ll Have Another won the Preakness Stakes, they were snatched up in about three minutes.
